title: Helmsman Task Hierarchy & Dependencies
details:
Helmsman project task hierarchy and dependency mapping:

CRITICAL PATH:
1. Backend Schema Enhancement → Enhanced API Development → Daily Planning Algorithm
2. Basic AI Integration → Advanced AI Features
3. Frontend Component Enhancement (depends on schema)
4. Testing & QA (depends on all core features)
5. Production & Observability (depends on testing)

SPRINT MAPPING:
Sprint 1 (Weeks 1-2): Schema + API + Basic AI
Sprint 2 (Weeks 3-4): Planning Algorithm + Frontend Enhancement  
Sprint 3 (Weeks 5-6): Advanced AI + Testing + Production

COMPLEXITY DISTRIBUTION:
- High complexity (8-9): Daily Planning Algorithm, Advanced AI Features
- Medium complexity (6-7): Enhanced API Development, Frontend Component Enhancement, Testing & QA
- Lower complexity (3-5): Basic AI Integration, Production & Observability

PARALLEL WORK OPPORTUNITIES:
- Basic AI Integration can start with schema work
- Frontend work can proceed after schema is complete
- Testing can begin incrementally as features are completed

RISK FACTORS:
- Daily Planning Algorithm is most complex (9/10) - needs extra attention
- AI features dependent on external APIs - have fallback plans
- Migration scripts need careful staging validation
